name: Chess Online (itch)
description:
Game made to test some coding design and to showcase beatiful 3D Chess Pieces! For now there is only a Standard Chess Rules mode implemented, but it's pretty easy for me to add new modes with special rules. Feel free to ask for modes you are interested in and I'll include them on future versions!

Piece and Board models showcased are for sale, if you are interested contact us at: noga.epc@gmail.com
